articles.content:

articles.title: Person hit, killed by train in Franklin County - WSIL TV
articles.description: A person is dead after being hit by a train in Franklin County early Saturday morning. An investigation is underway.
articles.content:
ZEIGLER (WSIL) -- One person is dead after being hit by a train west of Zeigler Saturday morning.
